translation.en: [female officer] Can you tell me your full name? Yasmin Sundermeyer.
[female officer] This is the first time you're arrested for a felony charge,
translation.de: Das ist deine erste Verhaftung für eine Straftat.

translation.en: so I have to get your DNA.
It's just a mouth swab and a few fingerprints. Okay?
Stand right here on the white X.
Face the screen.
Do your left hand first.
So, young lady...
you seriously did...
or allegedly did all this stuff in those house shoes right there?
translation.de: oder mutmaßlich all das in den Hausschuhen getan?

translation.en: Now they're all dirty.
[male office] Have you been here before? Any jail?
translation.de: Warst du je in einer JVA?

translation.en: No?
Did you flee? Did you run?
Got up to, like, 130.
I got away, but then I got caught.
translation.de: Erst bin ich entkommen, dann hatten sie mich.

translation.en: So you really didn't get away, did you now?
translation.de: Also bist du nicht wirklich entkommen.

translation.en: Open up your mouth.
So, you know what's going to happen, right? The process?
You have the right to bail. What's your bail?
translation.de: Du hast das Recht auf Freilassung gegen Kaution.

translation.en: Hundred thousand dollars.
Someone can bail you out. Otherwise, you're gonna see a judge on Tuesday.
translation.de: Ohne Kaution kommst du am Dienstag vor den Richter.

translation.en: So... you'll get arraigned,
you'll enter your plea,
and then go from there.
Questions, comments, concerns?
All right.
Best of luck to you.
Head all the way down to your left.
You can use the phone in there.
You can call any of the bail bondsman's numbers
or any of your family members or friends.
[woman shouts] Hello?
Hello? Hello?
[woman] Oh, my fucking God!
What are you doing?
Being in here in jail, it'll break you.
Nobody in their right mind wants to be sitting
in a cell like this, caged up.
And this place is clearly crazy.
[female officer] At the Sacramento County Main Jail,
there are over 2,400 male and female inmates.
Jail is like a small town, but not like a normal small town.
translation.de: Der Knast ist wie eine Kleinstadt, aber keine normale.

translation.en: You gotta pick up on a whole new set of rules.
translation.de: Man muss ganz neue Regeln lernen.

translation.en: Everyone is in everybody's business
because our lives are really right on top of each other.
translation.de: weil wir auf engem Raum zusammenleben.

translation.en: There's no privacy in jail. We're women, we get periods.
translation.de: Es gibt keine Privatsphäre. Frauen kriegen ihre Tage.

translation.en: You know? We all gotta use the restroom, all that, you gotta get used to that.
translation.de: Wir müssen alle aufs Klo. Das ist gewöhnungsbedürftig.

translation.en: [inmate] And then there's relationship drama, so it gets even worse in here.
translation.de: Und es gibt Beziehungsdramen. Das ist schlimmer.

translation.en: One day, the one girl is dating one girl
translation.de: Erst ist die eine mit der zusammen,

translation.en: and the next day somebody is dating somebody else.
It's like a cluster fuck.
You gotta know who's around you,
you gotta know who you can trust. You gotta know all your enemies.
translation.de: Wissen, wem man vertrauen kann. Seine Feinde kennen.

translation.en: [guard] Back it up.
Go to your cells now!
[inmate] But when you find a good friend in here
it makes the time very easy.
I'm not gonna let this place eat me up or make me miserable.
[inmate] We might be locked up physically
but mentally and emotionally, I'm-- I'm free as fuck.
translation.de: aber geistig und emotional bin ich frei.

translation.en: Can't nothing stop my shine.
-I'm rollin'! -I'm rollin'!
translation.de: -Ich bin in Fahrt! -Ich bin in Fahrt!

translation.en: But it's really bad still. Like, I hate it.
translation.de: Trotzdem ist es schlimm. Ich hasse es.

translation.en: [male voice on PA] All right, ladies, once again, come out... then we'll do day room.
translation.de: Okay, die Damen, kommt raus, dann gibt es Gemeinschaftszeit.

translation.en: Whatcha doing?
You draw my picture yet?
You got talent, girl! You're gonna go somewhere in life.
translation.de: Du hast Talent! Du schaffst es weit.

translation.en: We're a jail, so most people that are housed here
translation.de: Die Insassen hier in der Kurzzeithaft

translation.en: are either waiting to go to court or they're waiting to be sentenced.
translation.de: warten auf ihren Gerichtstermin oder ihr Urteil.

translation.en: We see all different types of arrests.
Ones from DUI all the way to homicide.
All right, I need a shower after you.
I would get in with her, but we can't.
Ten percent of the population here are women,
translation.de: Zehn Prozent der Insassen sind Frauen.

translation.en: and they're only housed on the 7th floor.
translation.de: Sie sind nur im siebten Stock.

translation.en: -[door knocks] -What's going on?
[inmate] Let me out!
I need you to calm down
and wait for your turn to go out for day room, all right?

translation.en: By law, they only have to let you out for, like, three hours out of the week.

translation.en: Our shifts over here, like, our officers are pretty cool.
translation.de: Die Beamten hier sind ziemlich cool.

translation.en: So they'll run day room, like, once or twice throughout the day.

-[inmate] Good coffee? -Yeah. Thank you.
The things we do in jail.

Just the anticipation of knowing that I'm going to be free

No.

Even though I'm a big flirt,
I don't want nobody else but my wife.

translation.en: Which is going to be...
Yeah, I'ma stay to myself.

translation.de: Ich sollte vor vier Tagen rauskommen.

translation.en: -Really? -Yes.
Crazy.

It was kinda funny, 'cause we were watching--
I was at the movies.
And I was with my ex girlfriend.
We were watching one of those shoot 'em up bang-bang movies.

And I kinda just hinted around like, "We should rob these girls behind us."

translation.en: So, at the end of the movie, she was like, "You ready?" I was like, "For what?"
translation.de: Am Ende des Films fragte sie: "Bereit?" Und ich: "Wozu?"

And I'll never forget,
she asked one of the girls, "Can I have some change?"

So, we pulled out the knives...

I'm from the east coast.
So, I grew up over there.
I was living in New York.
I was happy.
I had my own place. I was running a business on 5th Avenue.

translation.en: I was doing tattoo conventions.
Then side money would be, like, hustling and selling drugs.

transportation of narcotics,
13 pounds of weed, 65 grams of meth,

it is unusual for a first-time offender to come into custody

One hundred thousand?

I can do--

instead I just ruin it.

nice ass real bitch.

We do chore time and clean up after the girls.
We're supposed to be role models. Sometimes, we kind of...
translation.de: Wir sollen Vorbilder sein. Manchmal lassen wir uns gehen, haben Spaß.

translation.en: We get a little out of hand, but we have fun with it.
translation.de: Manchmal lassen wir uns gehen, haben Spaß.

translation.en: -[Tayler] I want to hit you with it. -[Shayna] Yeah, I know.
[Shayna] You get more freedom being a worker.
translation.de: Als Arbeiter hat man mehr Freiheit.

translation.en: We can go into other pods. We can shower, use the phone.
translation.de: Wir dürfen in andere Bereiche, duschen, telefonieren.

translation.en: [Tayler] My door's always popped. Like, all day is day room.
It's nice.
[Shayna] This girl just came into booking.
[Tayler] Where is she? At 28?
[Shayna] Is that her?
[Tayler] Hi.
-[Yasmin] Hello. -What's your name?
Yasmin? That's a pretty name.
Thank you.
-[Yasmin] What's your name? -Tayler.
-Nice to meet you. -I'm Shayna.
[Shayna] We overheard that some girl came in here with a Sawzall blade
translation.de: Wir haben gehört, dass eine mit einem Sägeblatt,

translation.en: and a fully loaded pipe and a lighter
translation.de: einer vollen Pfeife und einem Feuerzeug

translation.en: -inside of her. -Yeah, like, she--
Shoved in her, you know, nani.
So, we were-- I was like...
-[chuckles] It was so bad! -She had a hospital band on, and she, like...
I'm like, "She's walking kinda funny. Maybe that was her, you know."
translation.de: Ich dachte: "Sie läuft komisch. Vielleicht war sie es."

translation.en: -[both laugh] -[Tayler] I really thought that was her!
translation.de: Ich dachte echt, sie war es!

translation.en: But I mean, like, she's not like that at all.
She looks super innocent, you know?
If you don't mind us asking, what are you in here for?
translation.de: Dürfen wir fragen, warum du hier bist?

translation.en: -[Tayler] That's no fun. How old are you? -I'm 19.
translation.de: -Nicht lustig. Wie alt bist du? -Ich bin 19.

translation.en: [Tayler] Nineteen? Me, too!
[Yasmin] I'm facing five felonies.
[Shayna] She said carjacking. She made it up.
There's "carjacking, assault with deadly weapon on peace officer,
translation.de: "Angriff auf Kraftfahrer, Angriff mit tödlicher Waffe auf Beamten,

translation.en: receiving known stolen motor vehicle,
reckless driving, alcohol and drugs."
Oh, my.
Well, she was on a good one, right?
What time do we come out?
[Tayler] Day room is really whenever they feel like offering it.
Try to use the phone and try to get a shower in, 'cause you don't know when your next one's gonna be.
translation.de: Telefoniere und dusche, weil du nie weißt, wann es wieder geht.

translation.en: Yeah.
-[Yasmin] I wanna see my mom. -[Shayna] It's going to be okay, okay?
translation.de: -Ich will meine Mom sehen. -Das wird wieder.

translation.en: You'll get through this.
I'm not gonna lie to you, it's not gonna be easy, but...
translation.de: Ehrlich, es wir nicht leicht, aber...

translation.en: you'll be okay.
We will see you in a little bit. Okay?
-We'll come check on you, okay? -Try to take it easy.
[Tayler] She was like... evading and like, assault with a deadly weapon?
translation.de: Flucht und Angriff mit tödlicher Waffe?

translation.en: Look at her!
-She's going to be here a minute. -[Tayler] Yeah.
She'll probably be fighting her case for a couple months.
translation.de: Sie wird zwei, drei Monate kämpfen.

translation.en: [Shayna] I mean, I thought I would be fighting mine for a couple months. I've been here ten months.
translation.de: Das dachte ich auch. Ich bin seit zehn Monaten hier.

translation.en: I don't even know how many days I have.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wie viele Tage ich habe.

translation.en: I might have forever. I might leave tomorrow. I don't know.
translation.de: Vielleicht ewig. Oder ich gehe morgen.

translation.en: I'll be here...
I don't know how long.
Long time. I don't even count no more.
I'm just trying to, trying to wiggle the numbers around and see what I can do with it.
translation.de: Ich spiele mit den Zahlen und sehe, was sich machen lässt.

translation.en: My max was nine years,
and doubled, since I'm a striker.
translation.de: Doppelt, weil es der dritte Verstoß war.

translation.en: He wanted to do four years doubled, which means eight years.
translation.de: Er wollte vier Jahre mal zwei, also acht.

translation.en: With the seven years and 85%,
I've already been two years flat.
I have to do a 90-day commitment first,
and then consecutive 150 days with half.
That offer came down to 16 months doubled.
translation.de: Das Angebot lautete 16 Monate mal zwei.

translation.en: Eighty-five percent of seven would be, like, five years, eight months.
translation.de: 85 % von sieben macht fünf Jahre, acht Monate.

translation.en: And then two years on top of that that'd be like three years, eight months.
translation.de: Dann minus zwei Jahre. Also drei Jahre, acht Monate.

translation.en: Which means 32 months.
Once I get there, they'll knock off 16 months.
And then 85% hopefully will go down to 66%
translation.de: Und dann sinken die 85 % hoffentlich auf 66 %,

translation.en: when I get over the wall in prison.
translation.de: wenn ich in die Langzeithaft komme.

translation.en: I have four months already in,
translation.de: Ich bin seit vier Monaten drin,

translation.en: which doubles to eight months, so I would have eight months left.
translation.de: was auf acht verdoppelt wird, also bleiben acht Monate.

translation.en: It would just be way lower than that.
I'd probably have two years left to do.
So...
-[producer] I'm a little confused. -[inmate laughs]
So I'm fucked.
Yeah. Don't go to jail. [chuckles]
[male officer] Chow-time, chow-time, chow-time.
Pop your doors. Come out and grab one tray
translation.de: Türen auf. Holt euch ein Tablett

translation.en: and return to your cell. Do not try to grab an extra tray for yourself.
translation.de: und geht in eure Zelle zurück. Kein zweites Tablett.

translation.en: That's a long-ass line!
Whatcha want me to do? Push these bitches out the way?
translation.de: Soll ich die anderen etwa wegschubsen?

translation.en: See this nasty-ass food?
Fake-ass chicken strips.
This some beans. Nasty-ass carrots.
translation.de: Was ist das? Bohnen? Eklige Möhren.

translation.en: [Monster] That's called, "I'm hungry."
I don't know if I'm doing this pruno right, but... [inhales]
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob ich den Pruno richtig mache.

translation.en: It's really just oranges and pineapples, but... we probably won't get no more pineapples.
translation.de: Es sind nur Orangen und Ananas, aber Ananas gibt es sicher nicht mehr.

translation.en: [Monster] Pruno is alcohol.
It's usually made with fruit.
[Noonie] I always make the best mother-fucking drink.
It's not infrequent for us to find pruno,
as far as cell searches and shakedowns are concerned.
We'll obviously confiscate it.
It's one of the easiest things to make in jail,
as long as you have some form of a sugary substance,
access to fruit, which we give them on a daily basis
translation.de: Zugang zu Obst, das sie täglich bekommen,

translation.en: and warm water, which they also have access to.
translation.de: und zu warmem Wasser, was sie auch haben.

translation.en: You put it in a bag, wait for like a week or so...
translation.de: Man steckt es eine Woche oder so in eine Tüte.

translation.en: You gotta burp it when the bag blows up.
translation.de: Wenn sich die Tüte aufbläht, lasst man Luft ab.

translation.en: Then it's done.
[Drea] Whatcha doing in there, girl?
-Bitch there's nothing but food in here. -[laughter]
[Noonie] Leave me alone.
Better, like, talking to my fucking self.
translation.de: Ich rede lieber mit mir selbst.

translation.en: [Drea] Okay.
All right!
I don't fuck with Drea.
translation.de: Ich lege mich nicht mit Drea an.

translation.en: I'm here for burglary.
Jail gets a little boring, so I like to entertain myself
translation.de: Knast ist öde, also vertreibe ich mir die Zeit.

translation.en: and my way of doing that is with females.
[Drea] I have a lot of females in here that do want to be with me.
translation.de: Viele Frauen hier wollen mit mir zusammen sein.

translation.en: There's kinda a lot of ducks in here.
There's not really too many pretty people right now.
I'm not gonna waste my time with no ducks.
Unless they're profitable.
If they got something for me, commissary or something. I don't know.
translation.de: Haben sie was aus dem Knastladen oder so, vielleicht.

translation.en: You've got straight bitches, bisexual bitches, and then you got bi-choosy bitches.
translation.de: Es gibt Heteros, bisexuelle und bi-wählerische Tussis.

translation.en: Wait, you're telling me I'm choosy?
There's always drama behind Drea.
She wants attention whether it be negative or positive.
translation.de: Sie will Aufmerksamkeit, ob negativ oder positiv.

translation.en: She's an agitator.
If she causes an argument with somebody, it gets our day room shut down.
translation.de: Wenn sie Streit anfängt, ist die Gemeinschaftszeit vorbei.

translation.en: [male officer on PA] O-rec! Go to O-rec. Again, O-rec, go to O-rec.
[inmate] Come on, you don't need to be on TV. [inmate 2] I know
I'm finna watch.
-[woman 2] Hey, girl! -[woman 1] Whatcha doing?
She's tryin to get at me, girl. Gotta get the good view.
[inmate] Look at these thirsty-ass thots.
[woman 2] Oh, hell no! I'm gonna be on.
It's hard to hear them. They're so far down there.
translation.de: Man hört sie kaum. Sie sind weit weg.

translation.en: [woman 1] It's heavy. I can tell.
Yes.
[male officer on PA] All right, ladies, outdoor rec is over.
Please return to your cells.
translation.de: Bitte geht sofort zurück in eure Zellen.

translation.en: [Rowland] Ladies!
Why are we screwing up already?
Quiet!
We could have easily put you guys on lockdown
for that little stint you guys pulled in outdoor rec.
translation.de: nach eurem Quatsch in der Freistunde.

translation.en: -[unintelligible protest] -Hold on!
There were a group of people screaming at people on the streets
translation.de: Ein paar von euch haben Passanten angeschrien,

translation.en: and it caught someone's attention outside.
translation.de: und jemand draußen hat es bemerkt.

translation.en: [inmate] Yes, we understand. We apologize.
translation.de: Ja, verstanden. Es tut uns leid.

translation.en: Which one apologizes?
[inmate] It was an old man, and I couldn't tell if he was my lawyer.
translation.de: Ich dachte der alte Mann sei mein Anwalt.

translation.en: There are many old men walking the streets of downtown Sacramento.
translation.de: In Sacramento laufen viele alte Männer herum.

translation.en: I highly doubt that was your attorney in particular.
translation.de: Ich bezweifle, dass es dein Anwalt war.

translation.en: All right!
If you guys have questions, I will answer them as I do the next cell check.
translation.de: Fragen beantworte ich bei der nächsten Zellenkontrolle.

translation.en: [male officer on PA] Into your cells for lockdown.
-[male officer on PA] Hey, Beason. -[Shawn] Yes?
Beason, roll up your stuff. You're getting released.
-Okay, I'm rolled up. -[cellmate] Amen!
-[cellmate] Bye, girl! -[Shawn] Bye.
-[cellmate] Good luck! -[Shawn] Thank you.
[cellmate] Don't forget.
[Shawn] Yeah, they just let me go.
I'll try not to.
Alright, head on down towards the elevator for me, please.
Thank you. There you go.
Let a real one free.
[male officer] All right. There you go.
[Shawn] I don't want to do this forever.
translation.de: Ich will das nicht ewig machen.

translation.en: It's time for me to grow up.
I want to go back to school.
I'm willing to, you know, work hard,
I guess, for money.
And not just take it.
Hey, babe!
I'm in the release tank. You here to pick me up?
[Christine] I'm here.
-Are you going to be in the same spot? -Yeah.
Okay, I'll see you in a minute. Okay?
All right.
[Shawn] My wife, I know that she loves me.
She's there for me as much as she can right now, but it's tough for her.
translation.de: Sie ist für da mich, so gut sie kann, aber hat es schwer.

translation.en: Every time I go to jail,
it seems like it's longer and longer each time I go back.
Come on. My ride is waiting.
We're a team, and when a piece of the team is gone,
translation.de: Wir sind ein Team, und wenn ein Teil fehlt,

translation.en: it just makes it hard.
-Is there a Ms. Beason? -Yes.
Go ahead and step out right here.
Right around this way. Follow that yellow line down.
Yes.
Stop right there.
Face the wall.
Why am I going in here?
Still in the process of processing your release.
Your parole officer decided they wanted to place a hold.
translation.de: Ihr Bewährungshelfer hält den Vorgang an.

translation.en: So you're not gonna be going home at this time until your parole officer...
translation.de: Sie werden erst entlassen, wenn er...

translation.en: takes care of all that.
[Shawn] Shit.
Oh, my gosh, this is crazy.
[Hernandez] When I first was assigned to the Intel and Classification Unit,
translation.de: Als ich in die Info- und Einstufungsabteilung kam,

translation.en: everybody had a theme to their desk.
A football theme, puppies theme, and then they asked me,
translation.de: Zu Themen wie Football, Welpen... Ich wurde gefragt:

translation.en: "What is your theme going to be?"
And I thought it was a joke.
translation.de: Ich hielt es für einen Witz.

translation.en: So I said, "I don't know, unicorns farting out rainbows?"
translation.de: Also sagte ich: "Einhörner, die Regenbogen furzen?"

translation.en: Well, they decided to decorate my cubicle.
So I just kept the theme and now we got it going.
It was at one point a really blowed-up unicorn
translation.de: Das war mal ein aufgeblasenes Einhorn,

translation.en: and it had Skittles coming out of the mouth.
We have to do our best in our facilities to ensure that everybody is safe.
translation.de: Wir müssen in unseren Anstalten für die Sicherheit aller sorgen.

translation.en: It's in human nature for...
especially inmates here to break rules and violate rules.
translation.de: besonders für Insassen, gegen Regeln zu verstoßen.

translation.en: We can't catch everything, but it happens.
translation.de: Wir bekommen nicht alles mit, aber manches schon.

translation.en: [Hernandez] Girls, get fully dressed.
Hawkins, control.
Jones, I need you in the classroom now.
-[Monster] What the fuck? -[Noonie] Why?
Get fully dressed.
[Monster] All right, we coming.
That hella fucked up, man.
Because we have approximately 135 inmates that are booked daily,
translation.de: Da wir täglich etwa 135 Insassen registrieren,

translation.en: we try to conduct shakedowns as often as we can.
And sometimes, we can get tips from other inmates.
They'll let us know, "Hey, something's going on in this cell."
translation.de: Sie sagen: "Hey, in der Zelle ist etwas los."

translation.en: Do you want to go through this side and I'll go through this side.
translation.de: Mach du die Seite, und ich die.

translation.en: Don't know why she has all this.
[Rowland] Table's clear.
[Noonie] Somebody snitched on me.
So, they raided my room.
They always like to throw around my shit.
translation.de: Die werfen mein Zeug immer herum.

translation.en: It was like a handful of people that knew I had pruno, so...
translation.de: Eine Handvoll Leute wussten von dem Pruno, also...

translation.en: bitches was hating.
[Rowland] This bag's clear.
We got some joy juice.
Some pruno.
[female officer] Oh, nice.
I'm hella mad, 'cause they probably found my pruno.
translation.de: Ich bin sauer, weil sie sicher den Pruno finden.

translation.en: [Rowland] Kickstart our Friday.
translation.de: So geht der Freitag gut los.

translation.en: [female officer] Happy Friday.
I have disciplinary hearings
for Hawkins and Jones out of 118.
translation.de: mit Hawkins und Jones aus Zelle 118.

translation.en: [Hernandez] Hi, Hawkins.
Sgt. Hernandez, I'm here to do your hearing.
translation.de: Sgt. Hernandez. Ich führe das Gespräch.

translation.en: Hi, Jones. How are you?
translation.de: Hi, Jones. Wie geht es dir?

translation.en: Tired. I wanna go back to sleep. [Hernandez] And I'm tired, too.
translation.de: -Müde. Ich will wieder schlafen. -Ich bin auch müde.

translation.en: So apparently, some officers did some shakedowns
translation.de: Ein paar Beamte haben bei Durchsuchungen

translation.en: and they found a plastic bag, odor of an alcoholic beverage,
and they found pruno in your cell.
I mean, it's just...
I don't know whose it is.
There's no way it was a gallon and a half.
How much do you think it was? Maybe a couple cups?
translation.de: Wie viel war es? Zwei Gläser?

translation.en: So you're pleading guilty or not guilty?
I plead the fifth.
[Hernandez] This is just basically in-house rules.
You're not gonna get extra charges if that's what you think.
-Penal Code charges. -[Monster] I'm gonna say I'm not guilty, because it's not... I don't know whose it is.
translation.de: Ich sage unschuldig, weil ich nicht weiß, wem es gehört.

translation.en: Was it good stuff?
Did you make it?
-No. -Did you even taste test it?
[Noonie] No. I wish I did.
So are you saying this is your stuff that was in here?
translation.de: Sagst du also, es war deins?

translation.en: No, I'm not saying that.
So whose pruno was it?
-Miraculously-- -I don't even know how to make pruno.
translation.de: -Ein Wunder... -Ich weiß nicht, wie man Pruno macht.

translation.en: And you were just waiting to drink it.
So, some magical unicorn came into your cell
translation.de: Ein magisches Einhorn ist in die Zelle gekommen

translation.en: and put this whole bag of pruno inside your cell.
Is that what you're telling me?
I appreciate you saying that you were ready to drink
translation.de: Danke fürs Eingeständnis, dass du ihn trinken wolltest

translation.en: and you knew it was in, acknowledged that it was in your cell.
translation.de: und wusstest, dass er in der Zelle war.

translation.en: I'm going to find you guilty, even though you plead not guilty.
translation.de: Ich sage, du bist schuldig, trotz deiner Beteuerung.

translation.en: You're going to get the max of 15 days.
Do you know what it means to be on restriction? Have you been?
translation.de: Weißt du, was die Einschränkung bedeutet?

translation.en: I can't come out in day room.
Yeah, no day room,
you get a disciplinary shower every other day.
You're allowed to have legal mail and make legal phone calls,
translation.de: Juristische Briefe und Anrufe sind erlaubt.

translation.en: and that is it.
Do you have any questions?
All right, go ahead and check back in and head back.
[Shawn] This is crazy.
Hi, I'm not getting released.
[Christine] What?
[Shawn] My parole officer put a parole hold on me.
I'm sorry, Christine.
This time I came to jail, it's been a struggle on me and my wife.
translation.de: Diesmal ist es schwer für mich und meine Frau.

translation.en: She isn't working, and she's doing the best that she can.
translation.de: Sie arbeitet nicht und gibt ihr Bestes.

translation.en: Do you love me?
Would you be able to do me a favor?
Could you send me some money?
Wow, are you serious right now?
Yes.
I don't have any. You need to grow up.
Now I gotta get back dressed into oranges.
translation.de: Jetzt muss ich mich wieder orange kleiden.

translation.en: [female officer] You're going to get completely undressed. Put everything in this bag.
translation.de: Zieh dich ganz aus. Alles in die Tüte.

translation.en: [inmate] Shawn? I thought you were leaving.
[Shawn] Bro, I'll tell you later.
[inmate] Okay.
I really did wanna drink that shit.
Probably would've been good right now.
I wouldn't admit to it
even if I did or didn't make it.
translation.de: ob ich es war oder nicht war.

translation.en: I'm not gonna admit to that.
I'm not gonna incriminate myself or anybody
translation.de: Ich belaste mich oder andere nicht,

translation.en: um, in that matter.
I think she shoulda got ten days.
translation.de: Sie hätte zehn Tage kriegen sollen.

translation.en: I think I should have gotten nothing, but-- Or, that's true.
Somebody...
definitely opened their mouth.
It's... wrong.
There's no need for somebody else to put their nose in anybody else's business.
translation.de: Die Angelegenheiten anderer gehen niemanden etwas an.

translation.en: [Monster] It's not really hard to figure out
who's talking.
Especially in here.
We have nothing but time to sit and listen
translation.de: Wir haben viel Zeit zum Zuhören

translation.en: and observe.
No, they hit our room because somebody...
-Opened their mouth. -Yes.
[Monster] Whose?
You know?
The one who didn't want it.
[Monster] That bitch, right?
Okay, okay.
If you snitch, then you're going to get to meet my fist.
translation.de: Wer petzt, lernt meine Faust kennen.

translation.en: You're fucking with my freedom.
And...
I know I fucked with my freedom by getting myself here.
translation.de: Ich habe selbst mit meiner Freiheit gespielt.

translation.en: I don't need nobody else do it for me.
translation.de: Das muss keiner für mich tun.

translation.en: [inmate] We love you Monster and Noonie!
[Noonie] Bitches is crazy.
I love it.
"Monster and Noonie, we love you!"
[yelling] Team Monster Gang! Yeah, yeah!
-[yells] Noonie Squad! -[both] Yeah, yeah!
[Monster] We need to let the whole jail know,
translation.de: Lassen wir es die Jungs oben wissen.

translation.en: let the guys know upstairs, knock on the bowl.
translation.de: Lassen wir es die Jungs oben wissen. Klopf ans Klo.

translation.en: Hello?
Hello!
Yo, Andrea Gunderson is a mother-fucking snitch
translation.de: Hey, Andrea Gunderson ist eine Scheißverräterin.

translation.en: and everybody needs to know.
Do what?
[male inmate] Let that bitch know snitching is a no-no.
Yeah, that bitch snitching is a scaredy-ass bitch.
You feel me? She's in her fucking cell--
-[male inmate] What cell is she in though? -She in 28.
[male inmate] It's always good to know about people like that
translation.de: Die wird sehen, was wir mit solchen machen.

translation.en: cause snitching is a no-no.
Snitching is a no-no, okay?
Fuck these snitches, man!
Yeah, I be talking on the toilet.
It's fun. It's better talking to the boys
translation.de: Ich rede lieber mit den Jungs

translation.en: than these raggedy-ass girls all the time.
Hey, bruh.
-Hello? -Hello!
-Hello? -Who's this?
What are you doing?
I had just got here from juvenile hall
and so, I didn't know anything about toilet talking or any of that.
My bunkie was like, "There's some guys banging on our line."
translation.de: Meine Zellengenossin so: "Jungs klopfen an die Leitung."

translation.en: -Hello? -What are you talking about?
-Hello. -People were talking into the toilet?
-Like, really? -Yeah?
I miss you!
So, to talk on the toilet bowl, you have to bail out.
translation.de: Um am Klo zu reden, muss es leer sein.

translation.en: You take all the water out, dump it in the sink.
translation.de: Man leert das Wasser ins Waschbecken.

translation.en: She bailed the toilet out and knocked, and somebody answered.
translation.de: Sie hat ans leere Klo geklopft, und jemand hat geantwortet.

translation.en: I was like, "Oh my God, what is happening here?"
translation.de: Ich dachte: "Oh Gott, was ist hier los?"

translation.en: Everybody has their own knock,
because there's people on the eighth floor, on the sixth floor,
translation.de: denn es gibt Leute im achten Stock, im sechsten,

translation.en: there's people on the fifth floor.
You can even talk to the boys on the fourth floor.
translation.de: Man hört sogar die im vierten.

translation.en: You can barely hear them, it's very quiet.
I hear you, motherfucker.
Is there any bitches on the line?
[female inmate] I've been trying to get bitches on the line for a minute!
translation.de: Seit einer Weile sind keine Tussis da!

translation.en: And then you can, like, create a relationship.
translation.de: Dann baut man eine Beziehung auf.

translation.en: I've been missing you all my life.
He was hella hot, and I was like, "Ooh, okay.
translation.de: Er war rattenscharf, und ich dachte: "Oh, okay.

translation.en: Talk to me."
This is my microphone. Hello?
Oh, hello?
I was like, "Oh, my gosh, this is so cool.
It's like having a cell phone!"
Hey, you hear me?
Who is this?
-It's Graham. -I'm on six.
Nah, I'm a white boy.
-Whatcha want me to tell her? -I don't know who figured it out,
translation.de: -Was richte ich aus? -Ich weiß nicht, wer es war,

translation.en: but whoever first did it was a genius,
translation.de: aber ein Genie hat das rausgekriegt,

translation.en: 'cause that's real science, for real.
All right.
He flushed, so he hung up the phone, so...
That's it.
I see you, bitch.
Be cool.
Okay. Just...
[Monster] I'm in here for 15 days.
-You got 15 days lockdown? -Yeah.
They gave me 15 fucking days.
Damn.
Just leave it alone.
You know, it's not that big of a deal. Ain't no one going to do shit.
translation.de: Es ist keine große Sache. Niemand macht was.

translation.en: Who is she talking to? Someone behind me? [chuckles]
translation.de: Redet sie mit einer hinter mir?

translation.en: I know she ain't talking to me.
[inmate] Stop it. Stop it.
We all know you tellin'.
Excuse me? That's one thing I'm not, is no snitch, bitch.
translation.de: Wie bitte? Ich bin keine Verräterin.

translation.en: You got me hella fucked up, bro. That's one jacket you ain't giving me.
I will not wear that one.
You got me hella fucked up. Anyways, get on the phone.
-[Princess] You're cute. -Get on the phone. I know I'm cute.
Thank you. At least I got a full set of pearly whites, bitch.
translation.de: Danke. Wenigstens habe ich schöne Beißerchen.

translation.en: Bitch, your teeth about to fall out, bro.
-You look like a duck, bitch. -[inmate] Andrea.
-Huh? -Stop.
Ah shit. That shit's drama.
translation.de: Ich hasse den Scheiß. So ein Drama.

translation.en: There's so many haters in here.
They are just jealous.
Okay. All right.
The whole issue with Drea is she speaks on people.
translation.de: Die Sache mit Drea ist, dass sie Leute verpfeift.

translation.en: There's multiple people who don't like her.
[Drea] One time.
Drea, she's just always running at the mouth.
It's like, either you run up or shut up.
translation.de: Du stellst die Person oder hältst die Klappe.

translation.en: [Princess] Little Miss Monster.
Hi, boo.
Some people aren't going to let it slide.
Not me. No more chances with me.
No more.
I don't know what she's doing, you feel me?
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was sie tut...

translation.en: [Princess] Bet you she won't.
Monster wants you.
What's up?
I never said nothing about you from jump.
-[Monster] Bitch, hold on a second. -I never said nothing about you from jump.
[Monster] Pump your fucking brakes.
I'm not gonna talk to you if that's how you speak to me.
translation.de: Ich gehe, wenn du mir so kommst.

translation.en: You can talk to me like a grown-ass woman. [Monster] I am talking--
No, you're not, you're cussing at me. Bitch, better calm the fuck down bitch.
[Drea] I'm done with you.
You're a fucking punk-ass...
Yeah, right. That all you have to say?
translation.de: Genau. Mehr hast du nicht zu sagen?

translation.en: -[Noonie] Bitch, you're scary! -[Monster] Suck my dick, bitch!
translation.de: Du hast nur Schiss. Lutsch meinen Schwanz.

translation.en: I'm telling you, she's hella hard right now.
translation.de: Ich sage dir, sie macht auf knallhart.

translation.en: Hella.
Go get your fucking teeth fixed, Princess!
[Princess] Step in the shower now!
Stop.
Step in the shower right now, though.
-[inmate] Stop! -Shut your dog-ass up, bitch.
You're hella ugly, bitch!
[inmate] Yeah, exactly. Stop.
Stop.
-[Princess] Meet me at the shower though -[inmate] Stop.
Look at me. Stop, please?
translation.de: Sieh mich an. Hör bitte auf.

translation.en: Stop.
That's why every bitch I've been talking to, you wanna get in on my nigga's line every single time.
translation.de: Darum will jede Tussi, mit der ich rede, mitmischen.

translation.en: That's why I snatched your bitch, that's right!
translation.de: Darum hab ich dir die Tussi geklaut!

translation.en: Miss me with that, bitch.
Go fix your teeth.
With your ugly ass.
Who do you think you're talking to, Drea? Who do you think you're talking to, Drea?
translation.de: Was denkst du, mit wem du redest?

translation.en: [control agent] Day room's on lockdown.
[male officer] We need to lock it down, now!
